subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch notched the biggest victory of his career by driving from the back of the field to win the Shelby 427 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway, his hometown track.
snippet: Kyle Busch notched the biggest victory of his career by driving from the back of the field to win the Shelby 427 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway, his hometown track.
